item.title: 汇丰银行估值有望突破3000亿英镑，高管表示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司的企业及投资银行业务主管表示，在市值首次突破2000亿英镑（约合2680亿美元）数周后，该公司市值目前正朝着3000亿英镑的目标迈进。【原文：Weeks after its market value rose above £200 billion ($268 billion) for the first time in its history, HSBC Holdings Plc is now on course for a capitalization in excess of £300 billion, according to the head of the lender’s corporate and investment banking arm.】

item.title: 高盛经济学家认为美国关税对欧洲经济增长影响有限
item.description: 高盛集团经济学家表示，特朗普总统最新威胁加征的10%关税，可能使欧元区国内生产总值减少约0.1%。【原文：The latest 10% tariff threatened by President Donald Trump is likely to shave off about 0.1% from the euro area’s gross domestic product, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. economists.】

item.title: 习近平的出口机器因美国强迫盟友而获得提振
item.description: 在习近平应对前所未有的通缩和投资萎缩之际，他押注中国能向世界出售更多商品来推动增长。为此，特朗普对美国关键盟友的威胁可谓恰逢其时。【原文：As Xi Jinping battles unprecedented deflation and shrinking investment, he’s betting that China can sell more and more goods to the world to drive growth. To that end, Donald Trump’s threats against key US allies are coming at a good time.】

item.title: 据称托斯卡基金正考虑出售葡萄牙保险公司卡拉维拉
item.description: 据知情人士透露，托斯卡基金资产管理公司及其他卡拉维拉保险公司的少数股东正考虑出售这家葡萄牙保险公司。【原文：Toscafund Asset Management and other minority shareholders of Caravela Seguros are exploring a sale of the Portuguese insurer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称英国应加倍发行国债以提振国债市场
item.description: 摩根士丹利策略师表示，英国应将政府票据发行量翻倍，以缓解国债市场的压力并降低借贷成本。【原文：The UK should double its issuance of government bills to ease strains in the gilt market and lower borrowing costs, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: 马来西亚计划今年发行美元债券，这是自2021年以来的首次发行。
item.description: 马来西亚已就美元债券发行事宜与债务安排机构进行接洽，这使该亚洲国家有望加入2026年迄今创纪录的全球融资狂潮。【原文：Malaysia has sounded out debt arrangers about a dollar bond offering, putting the Asian government on track to join a record global fundraising binge so far in 2026.】

item.title: 腾讯、富达据称计划投资巴斯迪明公司IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司、富达国际有限公司和淡马锡控股私人有限公司计划投资中国零食零售商百事明集团有限公司在香港的首次公开募股。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd., Fidelity International Ltd. and Temasek Holdings Pte are planning to invest in the Hong Kong initial public offering of Chinese snack retailer Busy Ming Group Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 策略师称美国关税对欧洲股市的冲击将是短暂的
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统最新关税威胁对欧洲股市仅构成短期风险，因企业盈利前景整体依然强劲。【原文：President Donald Trump’s latest tariff threats present only a short-term risk to European stocks as the broader corporate earnings outlook remains robust.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告称，人工智能和贸易问题对稳健的全球增长前景构成风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织小幅上调了今年全球经济增长预期，但警告称，对人工智能泡沫的担忧以及贸易和地缘政治紧张局势仍对世界经济构成风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund slightly raised its outlook for global growth this year, but it warned that concerns about an artificial intelligence bubble as well as trade and geopolitical tensions remain risks to the world economy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织预计英国年底通胀率将达2%，因工资增长放缓
item.description: 国际货币基金组织最新预测显示，随着就业市场疲软导致薪资涨幅收窄，英国通胀率将在年底回落至2%的目标水平。【原文：Inflation in the UK will fall back to the 2% target by the end of the year, as a weak jobs market results in smaller pay rises, according to the International Monetary Fund’s latest forecasts.】

item.title: 新世界股份大涨16%，市场押注母公司将提供更多支持
item.description: 新世界发展公司股价飙升16%，创下两年新高，市场押注其母公司可能加大对这家陷入困境的开发商的支持力度。【原文：New World Development Co. shares surged 16% to the highest level in two years on bets the company’s parent may boost its support for the troubled developer.】

item.title: 管道公司寻求8.24亿美元融资，创肯尼亚11年来首次IPO纪录
item.description: 肯尼亚计划通过国有管道公司首次公开募股筹集创纪录的106.3亿先令（约合8.241亿美元）。【原文：Kenya plans to raise a record 106.3 shillings ($824.1 million) from an initial public offering of a state-run pipeline company.】

item.title: ASM订单超预期，得益于中国市场复苏与人工智能支出激增
item.description: ASM国际公司公布的第四季度订单量超出预期，这得益于中国芯片制造设备订单的增长以及人工智能相关领域强劲的需求。【原文：ASM International NV reported fourth-quarter orders that beat expectations on the back of an improvement in bookings for its chip-making equipment from China and strong demand in artificial intelligence-linked segments.】

item.title: 为何科技界为克劳德代码疯狂
item.description:
也许这就是AGI的本质。

【原文：

Maybe this is what AGI is.

】

item.title: 零散股：科技界为何为克劳德代码疯狂（播客）
item.description: 在人工智能行业，总有新宠横空出世。先是ChatGPT风靡一时，接着是图像生成器大放异彩。 去年下半年，DeepSeek引发轰动，谷歌Gemini的卓越表现令众人惊叹。而2026年1月，新晋热门话题当属Claude Code。当然，AI模型生成代码的功能早已存在。那么Claude Code究竟有何特别之处？为何人们纷纷追问："这是否意味着..."【原文：In the AI industry, there’s always a hot new thing. First it was ChatGPT. Then it was the image generators. There was the DeepSeek moment. In the latter half of last year, everyone was excited about how good Google’s Gemini was. In January 2026, the new hot thing everyone is talking about is Claude Code. But of course, the AI models have been able to generate lines of code for a long time now. So what is it about Claude Code that has people so excited? Why is it that people are asking: “Is this】

item.title: 对冲基金增持日元空头头寸，增幅创2015年以来新高，因日本大选
item.description: 对冲基金上周大幅增加看跌日元的押注，增幅创十余年来新高，投资者正权衡日本提前大选的可能性及其对财政政策的影响。【原文：Hedge funds ramped up bearish yen wagers by the most in over a decade last week as investors weighed the prospects of a snap Japanese election and its implication on fiscal policy.】

item.title: 英维斯集团董事长认为海湾地区IPO市场正在好转
item.description: 据Investcorp执行主席穆罕默德·阿拉迪称，海湾地区市场的首次公开募股前景正在好转。【原文：The outlook for initial public offerings is getting better in Gulf markets, according to Investcorp’s Executive Chairman Mohammed Alardhi.】

item.title: 维托尔以更窄折扣向中国供应委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 维托集团向中国买家提供委内瑞拉原油货品，价格较洲际交易所布伦特原油每桶折让约5美元，以此测试亚洲市场对该南美国家基准重质酸性原油的需求。【原文：Vitol Group has offered Venezuelan cargoes to Chinese buyers at discounts of around $5 a barrel to ICE Brent, testing Asia’s appetite for the South American nation’s benchmark heavy, sour crude.】

item.title: 炼油商避开阿联酋旗舰油种穆尔班，转投更廉价替代品
item.description: 据交易商称，随着其他油种价格走低，亚洲炼油商正逐步放弃阿布扎比旗舰油种穆尔班原油。【原文：Asian oil refiners are switching from Abu Dhabi’s flagship Murban crude as other grades become cheaper, according to traders.】

item.title: 拜耳股价大涨，因美国最高法院将审理"农达"除草剂上诉案
item.description: 拜耳公司股价飙升，此前美国最高法院表示将受理该公司就"农达"除草剂案提出的上诉，该案可能削弱数千起与该除草剂相关的诉讼。【原文：Bayer AG’s shares surged after the US Supreme Court said it would hear the company’s appeal in a Roundup case that could undercut thousands of lawsuits tied to the weedkiller.】

item.title: 中国在推动人民币国际化的进程中，于非洲再添新里程碑
item.description: 赞比亚成为首个允许中国矿企以人民币缴税的非洲国家。随着北京方面致力于推动人民币国际化并降低对美元的依赖，赞比亚很可能不会是最后一个。【原文：Zambia is the first African country to let Chinese mining companies pay taxes in yuan. It probably won’t be the last, as Beijing seeks to internationalize the currency and dilute its dollar dependence.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商因特朗普最新关税威胁股价下跌
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商股价暴跌，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在格陵兰岛争端中威胁再次提高关税。【原文：European automakers plunged after US President Donald Trump threatened to hike tariffs again in the standoff over Greenland.】

item.title: 特斯拉、沃尔沃有望成为中加电动汽车协议的首批受益者
item.description: 特斯拉公司和浙江吉利控股集团旗下品牌，很可能成为加拿大削减中国制造电动汽车进口关税的首批受益者。【原文：Tesla Inc. and brands controlled by Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co. will likely be the first beneficiaries of Canada’s move to slash import tariffs on made-in-China electric vehicles.】

item.title: 普拉博沃提名侄子担任印尼央行副行长
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃·苏比安托提名其侄子担任印尼央行副行长，引发投资者担忧此举可能侵蚀央行独立性。印尼盾收盘价逼近历史最低点。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto has nominated his nephew for Bank Indonesia deputy governor, sparking apprehension among investors that the move could erode the central bank’s autonomy. The rupiah closed near its record low.】

item.title: 韩国、台湾地区引领亚洲新兴市场股市走高，扭转格陵兰关税担忧情绪
item.description: 亚洲新兴股市上涨，韩国和台湾地区领涨，扭转了早盘因美国总统特朗普宣布对八个欧洲国家征收新关税（涉及格陵兰问题）而引发的跌势。【原文：Emerging Asian equities gained, led by South Korea and Taiwan, helping reverse early declines fueled by US President Donald Trump’s announcement of new tariffs on eight European countries over Greenland.】

item.title: 英国富时100指数料将下跌，关税担忧冲击股市
据称，由布鲁克菲尔德支持的印度能源公司Clean Max计划缩减首次公开募股规模
item.description: 知情人士透露，由布鲁克菲尔德集团支持的可再生能源公司Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Ltd.正计划于2月启动首次公开募股，但交易规模将有所缩减。【原文：Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Ltd., a renewable energy company backed by Brookfield Corp., is preparing to launch its initial public offering in February with a reduced deal size, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称曼达尼面临纽约证交所德州交易站的"重大考验"
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普称纽约证券交易所设在得克萨斯州的股票交易分支机构是纽约市的"难以置信的坏事"，并称这是对本月早些时候上任的市长佐兰·曼达尼的"重大考验"。【原文：President Donald Trump called a New York Stock Exchange equities trading outpost in Texas “an UNBELIEVABLY BAD THING” for New York and a “big test” for Mayor Zohran Mamdani, who took office earlier this month.】

item.title: HDFC银行贷款扩张推动资产回收势头增强
item.description: HDFC银行有限公司公布的业绩超出预期，得益于健康的贷款增长，这表明印度最大的私营银行正开始收复去年大部分时间被竞争对手ICICI银行有限公司夺走的失地。【原文：HDFC Bank Ltd. posted better-than-expected results on healthy loan growth, signaling that India’s biggest private sector lender is beginning to recapture ground it had ceded to rival ICICI Bank Ltd. for most of last year.】

item.title: 印尼丹纳塔拉考虑在最新融资轮中筹集12亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼新设立的主权财富基金丹纳塔拉计划于上半年通过新一轮所谓爱国债券筹集20万亿印尼盾（约合12亿美元）。【原文：Danantara, Indonesia’s new sovereign wealth fund, plans to raise 20 trillion rupiah ($1.2 billion) in the first half via a fresh round of so-called patriot bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】
